body_html:
I think PyTorch is not properly detecting OSX nvidia drivers. You should probably help the build script with the following environment variables CUDA_HOME, CUDNN_LIB_DIR, CUDNN_INCLUDE_DIR.

This is the build script I use to build PyTorch master on Linux for reference: https://github.com/mratsim/Arch-Data-Science/blob/master/python-pytorch-magma-mkldnn-cudnn-git/PKGBUILD

body:
I think PyTorch is not properly detecting OSX nvidia drivers. You should probably help the build script with the following environment variables `CUDA_HOME`, `CUDNN_LIB_DIR`, `CUDNN_INCLUDE_DIR`.

This is the build script I use to build PyTorch master on Linux for reference: https://github.com/mratsim/Arch-Data-Science/blob/master/python-pytorch-magma-mkldnn-cudnn-git/PKGBUILD
